Name: Grey Cubes
About the game: Grey Cubes is a modern variation on the brick-breaker-type game, based on real-time physics and three-dimensional gameplay (not just 3d look). Minimalist in style, with clean graphics and deep, original soundtrack. The game contains 60 levels, each one is unique, each one with new challenges. Features: - addicting mechanics based on classic idea mixed with real-time physics and three-dimensional gameplay, - 60 highly diversified levels, - a traditional system of power-ups incorporated into modern gameplay mechanics, - multi-layered levels.
